document_data.name: Tibeem
document_data.deathnotes: (hung from the [[Stojanow Gate]]){{Cite adventurers league/The Courting of Fire|6}}
document_data.mainbody: '''Tibeem''' was a member of the [[Cult of the Dragon]] in [[Phlan]] in [[1489 DR]].{{Cite adventurers league/The Courting of Fire|5}}
document_data.Personality: The Cult of the Dragon agent was tight-lipped and never revealed information about the organization.{{Cite adventurers league/The Courting of Fire|8}}
document_data.Relationship: The cultist liked to drink at the [[Laughing Goblin Inn]] with his friends [[Spernik]] and [[Ellison Berenger]].{{Cite adventurers league/The Scroll Thief|8}} Spernik and Tibeem pretended to be scribes to find information for the Cult.
document_data.History: Tibeem and his fellow Spernik infiltrated [[Mantor's Library]] in Phlan in order to steal some books containing draconic lore and deliver it to the [[red dragon]] [[Scorlworyx]]. However, one day they were discovered and while Spernik managed to escape Tibeem was locked in combat with a summoned [[Knight of the Black Fist]]. He managed to kill the knight but was soon captured. Tibeem was brutally interrogated and died of his injuries.{{Cite adventurers league/The Courting of Fire|6-7}}
